meanings.definition: Having an ovule curved so that the micropyle approaches the funiculus.
meanings.sent1: The campylotropous ovule had a unique shape.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the campylotropous ovule under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The campylotropous ovule decided to take a different path than the others.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a campylotropous ovule, bending towards new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The campylotropous ovule's curve made it stand out among the rest.
